r.d: Zephir Parser is a code parser, delivered as a C extension for the PHP language.
r.n: ### Added - Enabled PHP 8.5 support [#160](https://github.com/phalcon/php-zephir-parser/issues/160) - Added full support for object variable declaration [#37](https://github.com/phalcon/php-zephir-parser/issues/37) - Added support for single letter classes [#166](https://github.com/phalcon/php-zephir-parser/issues/166)
